See Also:

listen

public void listen(int port)
Listen on the specified port for incoming connections. If a client connects and is not a Chess client, it drops the connection and continues listening until a connection with a Chess client is established.

Parameters:
port - the port to listen on
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if any i/o errors occur
